channel.title: domain adaptation on Nadjet's NLP Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in domain adaptation on Nadjet's NLP Stuff

item.title: Aspect Based Sentiment Analysis
item.description: In this post I report on approaches to ABSA as a Bert Sentence Pair Classification (BERT-SPC) problem together with domain adaptation of the Bert language model (BERT-ADA). I also present my implementation of both BERT-SPC and BERT-ADA.
